group_1.textRight: Kyosuke's gonna be here any minute! @I'd better get going!

group_1.textLeft: Okay! I had a lot of fun chatting with you.

group_1.textRight: I had a great time, too!
Let's get tea again someday! We can really@take our time then.

group_1.textLeft: That sounds lovely! Let me know when you'll@be back in Kamihama!
Oh, by the way, that perfume you're wearing@smells amazing.

group_1.textRight: I got it from another Magical Girl! @I really like it a lot!

group_1.textLeft: Oh really? It smells amazing, it's so @refreshing!
He's gonna love it for sure!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I sure hope so! He doesn't notice@many things other than music, so...

group_1.textLeft: What are you guys going to do after you@finish buying that CD?

group_1.textRight: Well, actually another Magical Girl gave me@a good idea for that, too.
There's this place in Kamihama where you @can see a perfect view of the night sky.
I was thinking I'll bring him there and we@can take it in together.
Who knows if it'll make things romantic or@not though...
I should really get to the station, [chara:200401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200401:cheek_0][chara:200401:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:200401:lipSynch_1]he's@almost there!

group_1.textLeft: You've got this in the bag, Sayaka.
You're charming, you have great ideas,@and you're super cute, too!
He's gonna fall in love with you for sure!

group_1.textRight: All right, well wish me the best. See ya!

group_1.narration: I dashed out of the cafe@and ran for the station.
It felt as if I was walking on air...
Something tells me today's gonna go great!

group_1.textCenter: All right! I'm ready to have some fun@today!
Who knew there were that many Magical@Girls out there...
